name: super birthday island
description:
For my girlfriend's birthday, I made an island populated with cute little animals that give her messages sent in by her friends and family.

I've replaced these HIGHLY personal messages with random jokes and uploaded it here incase anyone wants to see what the final thing looked like.

WASD to move, mouse to look around, left click to interact, spacebar to twerk your booty

Disclaimers!:
  • There's no gameplay other than running around reading messages!
  • Didn't do too much optimisation so performance may not be the best depending on your machine.
  • Very barebones, no menus, alt-f4 to quit
  • I used this asset extensively!
